title: Musæus, on the loves of Hero and Leander with annotations upon the originall. / By Sir Robert Stapylton Knight, gentleman of the Privie Chamber to the Prince.
author: Musaeus, Grammaticus.
publisher: Printed by F.B. for Humphrey Mosley, and are to be sold at his Shop at the Princes Armes in Saint Pauls Church Yard,
notes: The words "Hero and Leander:" are bracketed together on title page.
With an additional title page, engraved, signed: W Marshall sculp.
The first leaf bears verses on the frontispiece.
"Leander's letter to Hero, and her ansvver: taken out of Ovid" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
F11 is in two settings: with errata on (1) recto or (2) verso.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
